channel.title: Super Mario Brothers Bundle!
channel.description:
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/Super%20Mario%20Bros%20Bundle.png[/img]
Well, I decided I would through together a Mario Brothers bundle for you! It's full of music, sprites, fonts, backgrounds and even a editor! Enjoy!
IF THERES ANYTHING AGAINST THE RULES IN THIS BUNDLE, PLEASE TELL ME AND I'LL REMOVE IT!
[img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/mariomusic.PNG[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/editor.PNG[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/sprites.PNG[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/scan.PNG[/img]
[url=http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/Super%20Mario%20Bundle.zip]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/Super%20Mario%20Bundle.zip[/url]
